name: mincemeat
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a sweet, spicy mixture of small pieces of apple, dried fruit, and nuts (but not meat), often eaten at Christmas in mince pies: They served us mince pies filled with delicious homemade mincemeat. We made mincemeat pie for Thanksgiving.
AlasdairJames/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
mainly UK (also UK mince) meat, usually beef, that has been cut up into very small pieces, often using a special machine: It was mincemeat with onions for dinner.

a sweet, spicy mixture of small pieces of apple, raisins, and other fruit that is cooked in pastry
